set.description: The ID of the power to add the target entity into.
set.markdownDescription: The ID of the power to add the target entity into.

time_limit.description: If specified, this will determine how long the target entity will be stored in the specified power in ticks.
time_limit.markdownDescription: If specified, this will determine how long the target entity will be stored in the specified power in ticks.

type.description:
[Bi-entity Action Type](../bientity_action_types.md)

Add the target entity to the power that uses the [Entity Set (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_action_types/add_to_set) of the actor entity.

Type ID: `origins:add_to_set`
